title: Have you visualized exactly where you are in life? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. I believe that I am in the part of my life where I'm at a crossroads. In my part of life where I have to make either a good decision or a bad decision. Also, I’m at the part in life where I have to start thinking about what I want to do in life as a whole person. But still, I’m 15 and trying to study for my permit. Sincerely, Teresa Bolus
